item.title: The Game of Life
item.author: igoumeninja@gmail.com (Aris & Katerina)
item.description: Finally! I have been trying to start a dev blog for like 10 years now, and I always found a way to procrastinate that ğŸ˜©. I always thought I would never have the time or enough content to publish, and with how fast technology becomes outdated, it seemed inappropriate at the time. On the other hand, I always have been an enthusiast of generative artwork or algorithmic art, and I thought: “Hey, that never goes old!
